summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Lifecycle Analytics page. All core features working correctly including data display, Active Rotation Signals, phase cards, tabs, and enhanced tooltips/formulas.
passed_tests: Lifecycle Analytics page loads correctly with data (8 assets, 6 clusters, 2 rotations)
Active Rotation Signals display GAMING→AI (BUILDING) and DEFI→RWA (WATCH)
BUILDING badge shows 68% ERP score with proper color coding
WATCH badge shows 55% ERP score with proper color coding
ERP Score sections visible with detailed metrics (Vol: compressed, Fund: negative_extreme, Growth: +39%)
Vol, Fund, Growth metrics display with detailed tooltips and values
Overview tab shows 4 phase cards (ACCUMULATION: 2, IGNITION: 3, EXPANSION: 2, DISTRIBUTION: 1)
Phase cards show proper color coding (blue, green, orange, red) and 'Show formula' expandability hint
Assets tab loads and shows table structure with Phase, Confidence, Distribution columns
Clusters tab loads and shows cluster cards with confidence and phase information
What is Lifecycle Analysis section displays with PURPOSE, HOW IT WORKS, ERP SCORE, TRADING APPLICATION
Tab navigation (Overview, Assets, Clusters) works correctly
Stats cards show correct data: 8 Assets Tracked, 6 Clusters, 3 Igniting, 1 Distributing, 2 Rotations
Refresh button functionality present in header
Lifecycle explanation section is collapsible with detailed information
Trading application guidelines show phase-based recommendations (Accumulation=Buy, Ignition=Hold/Add, etc.)
Page maintains consistent design with FOMO branding and proper navigation structure
